vote.title: To authorize the appropriation and transfer of funds from the Special Income Tax Fund to the Construction Management Taxable Fund; to authorize appropriation within the Construction Management Taxable Bond Fund; to authorize the Director of Finance and Management to modify and increase the construction contract with Elford Construction Company, Inc., on behalf of the Office of Construction Management, for emergency repairs, renovation, and remediation to the West Side Early Learning Center; to authorize a transfer and expenditure up to $350,000.00 within the Construction Management Taxable Fund; to amend the 2022 Capital Improvements Budget; and to declare an emergency.  ($350,000.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
